channel.title: Unity Based Fps - Developers needed
channel.description:
IM moving on toward a new project, First Person Shooter powered by unity
Im looking for a team of 3 including my self, that has a little basic knowledge about unity. Im looking for someone to start this off with as a nooby, because I just got into unity around 2 hours ago xD if you are interested add my Skype: Austin-liang email: lakersfan700@yahoo.com

item.title: Unity Based Fps - Developers needed
item.dc:creator: @Revitalize Revitalize
item.description:
@Revitalize wrote:

Honestly, Unity is the best to develop indie games with because it can also export to many consoles as well as PC and OS, as well as Linux. You can code with JavaScript, c# and “boo”? I’ve been working on a black ops 2 zombies type game for a little while now. Honestly, It’s really fun, and you can really get into it. The only problem I find myself having is getting all the models downloaded to make the game look prettier, also I have a crappy PC, so it can’t hold that many Poly’s. But my best to you, Good luck, check out their forums and look at what other have made, maybe you’ll find inspiration to start learning a different programming language and how Unity operates around them.

Read full topic

item.title: Unity Based Fps - Developers needed
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:8, topic:518954”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=637405.msg4296876#msg4296876 date=1368380067]
What’s your previous game development experience?
[/quote]

I have a feeling that he just wants to love about with unity with someone else and has no capacity to follow through with ‘developing a game’. No offence intended to OP.[/quote]
At least OP is honest about it, and are not like those who require 3 years experience without being able to contribute anything themselves.

But yes, OP should learn to use Unity before here starts making a full game.

Read full topic
